title: Online Formative Assessment and Discussion Module Design for Nursing Humanities

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational nursing knowledge and humanities literacy
context.additional_context: Smartphone-based learning environment with real-time discussion participation and formative assessment-driven feedback

learning_goals: Accurately explain 80% or more core concepts of nursing humanities through online formative assessments.
Engage in at least three or more interactions with peer learners in real-time discussion modules.
Improve learning outcomes by 20% or more after incorporating feedback.
Develop and implement self-directed learning plans using digital tools.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
